name: Bomber Looks Down
description:
gold extra and Evgeni Puzankov present Bomber Looks Down a VN-like game where you take control of a giant bomber. Available in English and Russian.

Join Ia, the just born AI, aboard the giant bomber as she comes to terms with her purpose, CO, and the senseless war she has no choice but to be a part of.

The game takes around 15 minutes to complete and has two endings.
